none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on May 28, 2015 Description from Terminal Escape:
One of the more oppressive posts in recent memory, Oakland's THOABATH are an ominous cacophony of sound and manipulation. Primitive industrial noise struggling to bury haunting black metal ambiance backed by a distorted vocal attack that makes you feel like you are standing in a blinding snowstorm, submitting to the elements. The rhythm starts around the four minute mark, a premature death knell that only builds upon the foundation built by everything that came before...this shit is enveloping, and creepy as hell.  A STRING DETACHED
//4.bp.blogspot.com/-HWelfXW-crk/VWcFch39Y2I/AAAAAAAAMVY/MxLXkNWzaG0/s1600/thoabath%2Bimg%2Bcopy.jpg http://thoabath.bandcamp.com/releases //3.bp.blogspot.com/-ZO06VaMEy2g/VWcFahXsDhI/AAAAAAAAMVQ/83fCmL8Vc3A/s1600/thoabath%2Bcover%2Bcopy.jpg

seo.title: Thoabath - A String Detached - Terminal Escape
